summary:
Africanist by degree with a focus on socio-cultural anthropology and history, and internationally accredited in Social Impact Management and Measurement. I am mainly strong in project coordination, business development, team management and like to stimulate the diversity and uniqueness of everyone's knowledge and skills. My previous role was country manager Rwanda and SDG-project manager for a large Dutch agricultural expertise company.

I’m especially passionate about social entrepreneurship and community engagement to contribute positive impact. And in any work I do, I look for purpose in making this world a better place together.

2019}, 'end': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}}, 'company': 'Delphy', 'description': "For three years I worked as SDG Partnership Project Manager in Rwanda. The aim of this SDGP project was to strengthen the potato value chain in the country, to benefit the country's need for food security.

Activities include coordinating 15+ project team members, public and private stake-and shareholder engagements, overall strategic planning and timeline management, designing and implementing M&E structures, leading internal and external reporting, and overseeing external social media communication.

It was my main responsibility to coordinate the project to run correctly, achieving various results, such as improved knowledge and agricultural practices among 30,000+ seed and ware potato farmers, 5000+ farmers with better access to finance, new and more efficient hardware infrastructures, 8 farmer cooperatives with increased yields of 20-50%, and all private project partners having stronger business cases due to better communication, collaboration and efficiency throughout the potato value-chain.", 'title': 'SDGP Project Manager Rwanda (PPP)', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': 6077, 'name': 'Leiden University', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQEFlK1wNecYbA/company-logo_400_400/0/1519855876129?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=KwFN5kUM6lyLgjAXaylWnuNQ6g0XLwvWDjTK4Ug_mEg', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/school/leiden-university/', 'employees': {'start': 1001, 'end': 5000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}, 'end': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Leiden', 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}, 'end': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}}, 'company': 'Leiden University', 'description': '- The ambassador’s responsibility is to oversee internal and external communication regarding the faculty’s promotional activities related to Africa Studies, Latin-America Studies, and Russia Studies.
- Activities included actively promoting the university as its public face at all promotional events related to Africa Studies, Latin-America Studies, and Russia Studies. This also included giving many presentations throughout the country. Additionally, being a point of contact between the head of the faculty and prospective students, guiding prospective students during open days, and offering general support to department professors.', 'title': 'Ambassador for the Faculty of Humanities', 'employment_type': None}]}]
